display_long_description:
Experience a revolutionary form of Mixed Reality! Fight for your life--in a dark dimension, even your walls and furniture are transformed.

# Advanced VR Technique
UNDERLIE goes way beyond basic Mixed Reality. It uses a 3D scan of your environment to generate a sinister otherworldly realm. It takes advantage of the specific tech of the Meta Quest 3 to blend the real and virtual worlds. Meta Quest 3S users can still play the game--but with simplified room scan shapes, and without the depth-sensor based blending.
[media]

# Beyond Roomscale
Play in a single room--or play across multiple rooms! UNDERLIE can now combine multiple room scans to generate an even larger play area. (Rooms should be on the same level... no playing across multiple stories.)

# Future Development
To many people, a full-blown VR game that generates it's world based on the shape of your home would be considered the ultimate VR experience. But the scope of future development may partially depend on how sales go!

I hope there's a big audience out there who's excited about the potential here. To those who get the game--thank you for your support!
